name: Sten 66th bpsc, daroga, bssc test series, material
description: STEN Academy Application is online platfrom for preparing competitive exam with complete high quality content study material for upcoming various (State level PSC, FCI, SUB Inspector, SSC, IBPS, Railway,SBI) competitive exam.  Some Feature of STEN App:  1. Study Material: STEN Academy Platform to read online content of Various Subject,with Complete Brief Details for state public service commision,BPSC, BSSC, UPPCS, JPSC, MPPSC, like many government job for Sachivalaya, Sub Inspector and various staff selection commision .   2. Online Test Series: Sten Academy provides online test series for upcoming all exam with complete description solution in both Hindi and English. Current Affairs: Regularly Daily, Weekly, & monthly Currents affairs updates given through STEN academy with Online Current affairs Quiz.  3. Previous Year Question Paper: STEN Academy provides Previous year Question with online test for various exam.  4. Exam Alerts: STEN Academy gives that all Information for Exam cut off, Admit card Notification and Exam vacancy Notification alerts.
